about projects vitae

Shuang Chen

QuintilesIMS, Shanghai, China

I am currently a Part-Time Assistant (PTA) in management consulting department of QuintilesIMS, Shanghai, China. I received my Master's in Health Policy from Dartmouth College and Bachelor's in International Economics and Pharmaceutical from China Pharmaceutical University. I also interned at business strategy and operation department in Pfizer Innovative Health, Shanghai, China.

My research interests span a wide spectrum of topics in Health Economics, with a specific emphasis on Pharmaceutical Economics and Policy, Drug Pricing and Comparative Effectiveness. For more details of my previous research projects, please take a look at projects. I am currently looking for a Ph.D. position fulfilling my research interests and goals.
